-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A Haskell binding to a subset of libexif
--   
--   This is a Haskell binding to a subset of libexif. Only tag reading is
--   currently supported. Image files containing EXIF data can be read from
--   memory or disk.
@package exif
@version 3000.0.0

module Graphics.Exif.Internals
data ExifData
data ExifContent
data ExifEntry
type ExifTag = CInt
dataFromFile :: FilePath -> IO (Ptr ExifData)
dataFromData :: Ptr a -> Int -> IO (Ptr ExifData)
dataFree :: FunPtr (Ptr ExifData -> IO ())
dataGetContents :: Ptr ExifData -> IO [Ptr ExifContent]
contentGetEntries :: Ptr ExifContent -> IO [Ptr ExifEntry]
entryGetTag :: Ptr ExifEntry -> IO ExifTag
entryGetValue :: Ptr ExifEntry -> IO String
tagFromName :: String -> IO ExifTag
tagName :: ExifTag -> IO String
tagTitle :: ExifTag -> IO String
tagDescription :: ExifTag -> IO String

module Graphics.Exif
data Exif
fromFile :: FilePath -> IO Exif
fromData :: Ptr () -> Int -> IO Exif
getTag :: Exif -> String -> IO (Maybe String)
allTags :: Exif -> IO [(String, String)]
